citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:32 AM on 23 -
SEPT - 2021. Inspectors made contact with the licensee who confirmed no one was available for inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
Amanda Pope, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Sarah Cattaneo, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:32 AM on 23 - 
SEPT - 2021. Inspectors made contact with the licensee who confirmed no one was available for inspection.
